title: Wendy & Lisa - Fruit At The Bottom (Limited Edition) CDVWL25
description:
This is the Limited Edition of Wendy & Lisa's 1989 album, "Fruit At The Bottom", originally issued by Virgin Records in the U.K., that same year.


It contains the "Random Dance Mix" of "Lolly Lolly" which was omitted from the later reissue.


********


If you want to share more Prince (and associated artists) in lossless quality, tag your uploads with PRNArchive.


Rips should be created with Exact Audio Copy, as one continuous WAV image, with accompanying CUE file and LOG file. The WAV file can either be uploaded uncompressed, or compressed with FLAC.


If you want to include a separate folder of MP3 files, or scans, you are more than welcome - but the important contents are the continuous lossless WAV (or FLAC), CUE file and EAC LOG file.


PRNArchive / PRN Archive


********


If you would like to separate the continuous file, first decode from FLAC to WAV (if encoded to FLAC), then use the freeware Medieval Cue Splitter to split the WAV into separate tracks.
